title-group.article-title: NEW UNIFORM AND ASYMPTOTIC UPPER BOUNDS ON THE TENSOR RANK OF MULTIPLICATION IN EXTENSIONS OF FINITE FIELDS

abstract.p: We obtain new uniform upper bounds for the tensor rank of the multiplication in the extensions of the finite fields ùîΩq for any prime power q; moreover, these uniform bounds lead to new asymptotic bounds as well. In addition, we also give purely asymptotic bounds which are substantially better by using a family of Shimura curves defined over ùîΩq, with an optimal ratio of ${\mathrm{\mathbb{F}}}_{{\mathrm{q}}^{\mathrm{t}}}$-rational places to their genus, where qt is a square.
